https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xBz4qtEV7B7fWCZc0Dq1Hi2UYwS.jpg Directed by Shen Dong and starring Ray Lui, An Yixuan and Yuan Wenkang, Death and Glory in Changde recalls one of the most cruel and controversial battles during China's War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression (1937-45), Changde Battle, in November 1943. Death and Glory in Changde
